request.description:
Imports a Bundle that includes:
* HTMLPage /blog/index
* HTMLPage /blog/destinations/costa-rica
* Contentlet [Blog] Ecotourism in Costa Rica
* Blog Detail Page /blog/blog-detail

Imports a Bundle that includes:
* Imports personas

exec: pm.test("'page' element includes all properties", function () {
pm.expect(page["seodescription"]).equal("Visit Costa Rica a rugged, rainforested Central American country with coastlines on the Caribbean and Pacific.");

pm.expect(page["shortDescription"]).equal("Costa Rica is a rugged, rainforested Central American country with coastlines on the Caribbean and Pacific. Costa Rica is known for its beaches, volcanoes, and biodiversity. Roughly a quarter of its area is made up of protected jungle, teeming with wildlife including spider monkeys and quetzal birds.");

header.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_15_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/84.0.4147.125 Safari/537.36

Costa Rica is known for its beaches, volcanoes, and biodiversity. Roughly a quarter of its area is made up of protected jungle, teeming with wildlife including spider monkeys and quetzal birds.");

graphql.query:
{
  page(url:"/destinations/costa-rica") {
    __icon__
    archived
    baseType
    cachettl
    canEdit
    canLock
    canRead
    contentType
    deleted
    description
    extension
    friendlyName
    folder {
      folderId
      folderName
    }
    hasLiveVersion
    hasTitleImage
    host {
      identifier
      hostName
    }
    httpsRequired
    identifier
    image
    imageContentAsset
    imageVersion
    inode
    isContentlet
    conLanguage {
      id
    }
    live
    liveInode
    locked
    mimeType
    modDate
    modUser {
      userId
      firstName
      lastName
    }
    name
    owner {
      userId
    }
    pageURI
    pageUrl
    path
    publishDate
    seoTitle
    seodescription
    shortDescription
    shortyLive
    shortyWorking
    sortOrder
    stInode 
    statusIcons
    tags
    title
    titleImage {
      name
      idPath
      versionPath
    }
    type
    url
    working
    workingInode
  }
}

exec: pm.test("'Site' element includes all properties", function () {

pm.expect(host["keywords"], 'FAILED:[keywords]').equal("CMS, Web Content Management, Open Source, Java, J2EE, DXP, NoCode, OSGI, Apache Velocity, Elasticsearch, RESTful Services, REST API, Workflows, Personalization, Multilingual, I18N, L10N, Internationalization, Localization, Docker CMS, Containerized CMS");
pm.expect(host["description"], 'FAILED:[description]').equal("dotCMS starter site was designed to demonstrate what you can do with dotCMS.");

graphql.query:
{
  page(url:"/destinations/costa-rica") {
    template {
      iDate
      type
      owner {
        firstName
      }
      inode
      identifier
      source
      title
      friendlyName
      modDate
      modUser {
        firstName
        lastName
        userId
      }
      sortOrder
      showOnMenu
      image
      drawed
      drawedBody
      theme
      anonymous
      template
      versionId
      versionType
      deleted
      working
      permissionId
      name
      live
      archived
      locked
      permissionType
      categoryId
      new
      idate
      canEdit
    }
  }
}

exec: pm.test("'ViewAs' element includes all properties", function () {
pm.expect(persona["description"], 'FAILED:[persona.description]').equal("People who are passionate about winter sports.");
pm.expect(visitorPersona["description"], 'FAILED:[visitorPersona.description]').equal("People who are passionate about winter sports.");

body.raw:
{
	"clazz": "com.dotcms.contenttype.model.type.SimpleContentType",
	"description": "My Structure",
	"defaultType": false,
	"system": false,
	"folder": "SYSTEM_FOLDER",
	"name": "My Custom Structure {{$randomBankAccount}}",
	"variable": "myStructure{{$randomBankAccount}}",
	"host": "SYSTEM_HOST",
	"fixed": false,
	"fields": [
		{
			"clazz": "com.dotcms.contenttype.model.field.TextField",
			"indexed": true,
			"dataType": "TEXT",
			"readOnly": false,
			"required": true,
			"searchable": true,
			"listed": true,
			"sortOrder": 2,
			"unique": false,
			"name": "Name",
			"variable": "name",
			"fixed": true
		}
	]
}

item.description:
This test that the custom type Image contains the expecte fields.
Expected fields:

* fileName
* description
* fileAsset (Composed/Custom Type. see Binary type on our GraphQL doc)
* metaData (Custom Type. See Key Value type on our GraphQL doc)
* showOnMenu
* sortOrder

item.name: Related content respects language in query for parent

body.raw:
{
	"clazz": "com.dotcms.contenttype.model.type.SimpleContentType",
	"description": "Child type",
	"defaultType": false,
	"system": false,
	"folder": "SYSTEM_FOLDER",
	"name": "My Custom Child Type {{$randomBankAccount}}",
	"variable": "childType{{$randomBankAccount}}",
	"host": "SYSTEM_HOST",
	"fixed": false,
	"fields": [
		{
			"clazz": "com.dotcms.contenttype.model.field.TextField",
			"indexed": true,
			"dataType": "TEXT",
			"readOnly": false,
			"required": true,
			"searchable": true,
			"listed": true,
			"sortOrder": 2,
			"unique": false,
			"name": "Name",
			"variable": "name",
			"fixed": true
		}
	]
}

item.name: Create Parent ContentType with Rel Field to Child

body.raw:
{
	"clazz": "com.dotcms.contenttype.model.type.SimpleContentType",
	"description": "My Parent Type",
	"defaultType": false,
	"system": false,
	"folder": "SYSTEM_FOLDER",
	"name": "My Custom Parent Type {{$randomBankAccount}}",
	"variable": "parentType{{$randomBankAccount}}",
	"host": "SYSTEM_HOST",
	"fixed": false,
	"fields": [
		{
			"clazz": "com.dotcms.contenttype.model.field.TextField",
			"indexed": true,
			"dataType": "TEXT",
			"readOnly": false,
			"required": true,
			"searchable": true,
			"listed": true,
			"sortOrder": 2,
			"unique": false,
			"name": "Name",
			"variable": "name",
			"fixed": true
		}, 
		{
		     "clazz":"com.dotcms.contenttype.model.field.ImmutableRelationshipField",
		     "required":false,
		     "name":"rel",
		     "relationships":{
		        "velocityVar":"{{childContentTypeVariable}}",
		        "cardinality":0
		     },
		     "searchable":false
		}
	]
}
